name: @siegrift/tsfunct
author: Siegrift <e.tesarr@gmail.com>

devDependencies.//: NOTE: Typedoc mustn't be updated to ^0.16.0 as it has breaking changes

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn tsc --target "ES5" --outDir "dist" --declaration true && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist
scripts.docs: yarn clean && typedoc --theme minimal --out docs ./src --mode file --exclude './src/+(common|test)/*' --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate && cp -r ./assets/* docs/assets

hooks.pre-commit: python3 check_exports.py && yarn test && yarn clean && yarn docs && git add docs/*

description: Tsfunct is a **T**ype**S**cript **funct**ional library made directly for TS with its static typesystem in mind.
